# Code of Conduct

Create an environment where everyone can participate and learn.

* be respectful in interactions (assume good faith)
* ask questions to clarify and help each other learn
* value everyone's input and unique perspective
* don't harass!


* reporting mechanisms
  * Dr. Peter Franks, Ombudsperson
  * Dr. Lynne Talley, Ombudsperson
  * Keiara Auzenne, SIO Diversity Initiatives Coordinator

---

# Course Objectives

1. Learn and implement practices in research computing including:
  * data and project management
  * version control
  * code documentation
  * replicability.

2. Reproduce figures and results from published work:
  * hands-on experience with skills in objective 1
  * recreate and discuss methodology of research relevant to you
